DOC.brief_summary: This single center , open-label , non-randomized , one-treatment , one-period study evaluate metabolic profile safety single oral radiolabeled dose dalcetrapib male healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Metabolic Profile Dalcetrapib Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject , 45 65 year age inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 inclusive Any concomitant disease ongoing condition investigator 's opinion could interfere study could pose unacceptable risk subject Clinically significant abnormal laboratory value Infrequent bowel movement ( e.g . le one movement per 24 h average ) An intent father child within 3 month dose Any external internal radiotherapy open ( nuclear medicine ) seal source ( brachy therapy ) External irradiation ( radiological examination ) internal radiation ( diagnostic nuclear medicine procedure ) within one year study drug dosing ; dental radiography plain Xrays extremity allow dose
